types1:Item.types1:Name: ExpressAnalyticsGuide
types1:Item.types1:Description: This guide will help users to 1. Monitor activity logs 2. Create integration tasks 3. Assign a schedule

avosScreenflow.name: ExpressAnalyticsGuide
avosScreenflow.description: This guide will help users to 1. Monitor activity logs 2. Create integration tasks 3. Assign a schedule

screen.body:
Express Analytics Integration

screen.title: Data Sources
screen.body:
New Integration - Select Data Source

Select Data Source and Click Continue

options.option: [{"label":"Amazon RDS","value":"Amazon RDS"},{"label":"Amazon S3","value":"Amazon S3"},{"label":"Azure Data Lake Store","value":"Azure Data Lake Store"},{"label":"Google Cloud Storage","value":"Google Cloud Storage"},{"label":"NetSuite","value":"NetSuite"},{"label":"Salesforce","value":"Salesforce"}]

screen.title: Salesforce Connection Details
screen.body:
Salesforce Integration

 

Please provide following connection details

Name Suffix  
User Name  
Password
Security Token  
Service URL  
Object Name  

Schedule

Select a schedule for the integration job

options.option: This will be used to suffix the name of the connection and mapping task. Example Connection will be named as Salesforce_<Suffix> and Mapping Task as mt_salesforce_acct_to_s3_<suffix>
Select the object required for the integration

screen.title: Integration Task Details
screen.body:
Integration Task Successfully Created

Below are the details of the integration task.

Task Name  
Description  
Source Connection  
Target Connection  
Schedule

service.title: Get Container Id - Lookup Folder Name

serviceInput.parameter: This is mapping task was programmatically created using the details provided by the user from the Screenflow Guide

endScreen.title: Close Guide
endScreen.body: Click Close Guide --> Done button at the bottom of the screen to close the guide.

operation.expression: <activityLogResponse> {for $logEntry in $output.activityLogResponse[1]/activityLogEntry return <activityLogEntry> {$logEntry/*} <taskType>{ if($logEntry/type[2]='MTT') then 'Mapping Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='MTT_DP') then 'Data Preview' else if($logEntry/type[2]='MTT_TEST') then 'Mapping Test' else if($logEntry/type[2]='DSS') then 'Synchronization Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='WORKFLOW') then 'Linear Taskflow' else if($logEntry/type[2]='DRS') then 'Replication Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='DMASK') then 'Masking Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='PCS') then 'PowerCenter Task' else $logEntry/type[2] }</taskType> <taskStateDescription>{ if($logEntry/state='1') then 'Completed Successfully' else if($logEntry/state='2') then 'Completed with Errors' else if($logEntry/state='3') then 'Failed to Complete' else if($logEntry/state='4') then 'Task not Started' else () }</taskStateDescription> </activityLogEntry> } </activityLogResponse>

<activityMonitorResponse> {for $logEntry in $output.activityMonitorResponse[1]/activityMonitorEntry return <activityMonitorEntry> {$logEntry/*} <taskType>{ if($logEntry/type[2]='MTT') then 'Mapping Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='MTT_DP') then 'Data Preview' else if($logEntry/type[2]='MTT_TEST') then 'Mapping Test' else if($logEntry/type[2]='DSS') then 'Synchronization Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='WORKFLOW') then 'Linear Taskflow' else if($logEntry/type[2]='DRS') then 'Replication Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='DMASK') then 'Masking Task' else if($logEntry/type[2]='PCS') then 'PowerCenter Task' else $logEntry/type[2] }</taskType> </activityMonitorEntry> } </activityMonitorResponse>
